title: checking partitions on sd card | XDA Forums
text: ok im not sure if there are any threads on this as i am not really sure what to put in the search box for it i had to reflash a rom to my phone from scratch and cant remember for the life of me what i set the swap size to. any idea how i can check the sd card to see what it was set as through adb or terminal? i had to reflash a rom to my phone from scratch and cant remember for the life of me what i set the swap size to. any idea how i can check the sd card to see what it was set as through adb or terminal?
